content: **knitted basic jacket in 2 strands drops brushed alpaca silk the piece is worked bottom up with stripes sizes xs - xxl ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern as-170 yarn group c + c or e ------------------------------------------------------- **sizes** xs - s - m - l - xl - xxl **materials** drops brushed alpaca silk from garnstudio belongs to yarn group c 75-75-75-100-100-100 g colour 01 off white 25-25-25-25-25-25 g colour 20 pink sand 25-25-25-50-50-50 g colour 13 denim blue 25-25-25-25-25-50 g colour 15 light sea green 25-25-25-25-25-25 g colour 19 curry 25-25-25-25-25-25 g colour 18 cerise 25-25-25-25-25-25 g colour 07 red needles drops circular needle size 8 mm length 80 cm **knitting gauge ** 11 stitches in width and 15 row in height with stocking stitch and 2 strands = 10 x 10 cm note needle size is only a guide if you get too many stitches on 10 cm change to a larger needle size if you get too few stitches on 10 cm change to a smaller needle size
